segments.text: You're in great shape , Keith . Do you work out at a gym ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I do . I guess I'm a real fitness freak .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , how often do you work out ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I do aerobics every day after work . And then I play racquetball .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , do you want to play sometime ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Uh ... how well do you play ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , all right . But I'm not very good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem , Rod . I won't play too hard .
segments.speaker: S2
